title: 5(3) of the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No. 20 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment 

Scheme Act 2023 (Establishment Day) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited mother baby institution payment scheme act 2023 (establishment day) order 2024

title: 5(3) of the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No. 20 of
heading: 2. The 20th day of March 2024 is appointed to be the establishment day for
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of March 2024 is appointed to be the establishment day for 
the purposes of the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 
(No. 20 of 2023). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 February, 2024. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [68] 3
